permissions.title: Permissions Required
permissions.camera_microphone_required: You need to grant camera and microphone permissions to use sign language translation features.
permissions.camera_microphone_usage: This app uses camera and microphone access to recognize and translate sign language.

aboutAppSubtitle: Sign Language Translation and Learning Platform
missionDescription: Hand Speak is a platform that aims to remove communication barriers between hearing-impaired individuals and the hearing community, offering innovative technology solutions. Our goal is to make Turkish Sign Language accessible to everyone and increase social awareness.
visionDescription: To make sign language a universal communication tool with the support of technology and artificial intelligence, and to create a barrier-free world. To build a society where every individual can easily learn and use sign language in the future.
featuresDescription:
• Real-time sign language translation
• AI-powered motion recognition technology
• Comprehensive learning modules
• Interactive exercises and tests
• Multi-language support
• Offline usage capability
• Community-based content development
technologyDescription: We have developed an advanced system that can analyze hand movements in real-time using the latest machine learning algorithms and computer vision technologies. Thanks to our continuously learning structure, translation accuracy increases day by day.
impactDescription: Hand Speak is not just a technology product, but a movement that creates social change. By spreading sign language knowledge, we aim to increase the participation of disabled individuals in social life and strengthen social inclusion.
officeAddress: Istanbul Technical University Technopark\nAyazağa Campus, Sarıyer/Istanbul

help.welcome_message: We're here to help you on your sign language learning and translation journey. You can benefit from the resources below.
help.start_translation_desc: Get instant translation by making hand signs to the camera
help.learn_sign_language_desc: Learn alphabet, numbers and daily words
help.app_settings_desc: Edit language, theme and other preferences
help.faq_1_answer: The app uses artificial intelligence to recognize hand movements made to the camera and translates them into text or speech.
help.faq_2_answer: Currently, Turkish Sign Language (TID) is supported. Support for other sign languages will be added in the future.
help.faq_3_answer: The app can work offline for basic features. Internet connection is required for some advanced features.
help.faq_4_question: How can I improve translation accuracy?
help.faq_4_answer: Make sure there is adequate lighting, make clear movements, and position your hands within the camera frame.
help.settings_faq_1: How do I change the language?
help.settings_faq_1_answer: Go to Settings > Language and select your preferred language.
help.settings_faq_2: How do I enable dark mode?
help.settings_faq_2_answer: Go to Settings > Display and enable Dark Mode.
help.settings_faq_3: How do I change video quality?
help.settings_faq_3_answer: Go to Settings > Video Quality and select your preferred quality.

settings.title: Settings
settings.theme_mode_description: Use light, dark or system setting
settings.change_password_dialog_description: Enter your current password and new password

quiz.category_selection_description: Select a category to test your knowledge in that area
quiz.category_letters_desc: Test your knowledge of sign language alphabet
quiz.category_daily_words_desc: Common words used in daily life
quiz.score_excellent: Excellent! You are very successful in sign language.
quiz.score_good: Good! Your sign language knowledge is improving.
quiz.score_needs_practice: You can improve by practicing more.
quiz.question_1: How is the 'Hello' sign made in Turkish Sign Language?
quiz.question_1_option_3: Gently lower and raise right hand in front of head
quiz.question_1_option_4: Open both hands to the sides
quiz.question_2: How is the letter 'A' shown in TSL alphabet?
quiz.question_2_option_2: Index finger and thumb open, others closed
quiz.question_3: Which fingers are used for the number '3' in sign language?
quiz.question_3_option_1: Thumb, index finger and middle finger
quiz.question_3_option_2: Index finger, middle finger and ring finger
quiz.question_3_option_3: Middle finger, ring finger and little finger
quiz.question_3_option_4: Thumb, index finger and little finger
quiz.question_4: Which body part is touched to express 'Thank you' in Turkish Sign Language?
quiz.question_5: Which sign do you use to show the word 'Family' in sign language?
quiz.question_5_option_2: Putting fingers of one hand into palm of other hand
quiz.question_5_option_3: Making house shape with hands and lowering down
quiz.question_6: How is the letter 'B' shown in sign language?
quiz.question_6_option_1: Four fingers closed, thumb attached to palm
quiz.question_6_option_2: Four fingers open, thumb folded into palm
quiz.question_6_option_4: All fingers open, palm facing out
quiz.question_7: How is the letter 'S' shown in sign language?
quiz.question_7_option_1: Fist closed, thumb on top of other fingers
quiz.question_7_option_2: Index and middle finger open, others closed
quiz.question_7_option_4: Thumb open, other fingers closed and flat
quiz.question_8: How is the number '5' expressed in sign language?
quiz.question_8_option_2: Using two hands, 3 fingers on one hand and 2 on the other
quiz.question_8_option_3: Index and middle finger open in a V shape
quiz.question_8_option_4: Making a fist with thumb open
quiz.question_9: How is the number '10' shown in sign language?
quiz.question_9_option_2: One hand with all fingers open
quiz.question_9_option_3: Using both hands, with all five fingers open on each hand
quiz.question_9_option_4: Index finger and thumb in L shape, other fingers closed
quiz.question_10: How is 'Water' expressed in sign language?
quiz.question_10_option_2: Pointing to mouth with index finger
quiz.question_10_option_4: Making S shape and drinking motion
quiz.question_11: How is the word 'Love' shown in sign language?
quiz.question_11_option_1: Placing both hands in heart shape on chest
quiz.question_11_option_4: Pointing to chest with inward crossed curved hands
quiz.question_12: How is 'Sorry' expressed in sign language?
quiz.question_12_option_1: Bringing hand to heart and bowing slightly
quiz.question_12_option_2: Touching forehead with thumb and index finger together
quiz.question_12_option_3: Circular motion with palm against chest
quiz.question_12_option_4: Joining both hands in front and bowing
quiz.question_13: How is 'Good Morning' shown in sign language?
quiz.question_13_option_1: Moving hands upward like a rising sun
quiz.question_13_option_2: Waving hand and then smiling gesture
quiz.question_13_option_4: Opening and closing both hands next to cheeks
quiz.question_14: How is the word 'Today' expressed in sign language?
quiz.question_14_option_2: Pointing to ground with index finger
quiz.question_14_option_4: Pointing to self with index finger
quiz.question_15: How is 'Tomorrow' expressed in sign language?
quiz.question_15_option_2: Sliding both hands to the right
quiz.question_15_option_4: Opening both hands and moving sideways
